alert.note: Alert for Hughes; Hyde; Potter; Sully (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 12:15AM MDT until June 24 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Sully County in central South Dakota... Hyde County in central South Dakota... Potter County in north central South Dakota... Hughes County in central South Dakota... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 115 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Swan Creek Rec Area to near Lake Sharpe, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Stephan around 135 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Tolstoy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
